entities.name: kendra
entities.description: Kendra is mentioned as someone who has passed away. The text states that the narrator left to pay their respects at Kendra's funeral.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is the younger brother of the narrator and is mentioned as someone who could not accompany the narrator on their journey due to having a younger sister and little gold left to them.

entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Ariana is Albus's sister who passed away. The text states that her death had a profound effect on the Dumbledores.

relationships.description: Albus is mentioned as Ariana's brother. This relationship is described in the text when it states that Albus's sister, Ariana, had passed away.
There is no mention of a direct relationship between Albus and Kendra. However, the text does state that the narrator left to pay their respects at Kendra's funeral.
The text states that Ariana's death had a profound effect on the Dumbledores, implying that Albus is a member of the Dumbledore family.
